issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

resolution.description: The problem is a duplicate of an existing issue.
resolution.name: Duplicate

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Tooling
components.description: Items related to Alloy tooling and workflow

fields.description: npm WARN deprecated wrench@1.3.9: wrench.js is deprecated! You should check out fs-extra (https://github.com/jprichardson/node-fs-extra) for any operations you were using wrench for. Thanks for all the usage over the years.
fields.summary: Remove usage of wrench in favor of fs-extra

comments.body: Closing as this was done thanks to the awesome work by miga here https://github.com/appcelerator/alloy/pull/837 (ALOY-1524)
